Created an attachment (id=84390)
screenshot

1.Create PHP project with some files in it (01.php,02.php,03.php and 04.php for example)
2.Rename 04.php to clue.php
3.Press the Back button from the coolbar

Expected result:
In the Editor is open previous file used which is 03.php as 04.php is no longer existing.At least not under this name

Actual result:
In the Editor is opened message file that 04.php does not exist.Error is thrown in the log:
